name: M1: A Death in the Desert
description: When M wakes up in an abandoned hotel he has no memory of how he got there. In the bedside draw he finds a list with three names and a gun with three bullets, but what he does with this information is up to you. How far will you go to discover the truth?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP x86 or later Processor: Pentium 4 1.66 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX capabilities Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX capabilities
